name: Conqueror Kagon Blackskull
setname: Wrath of the Lich King Promo
rules: Protector 3 -> Remove target ally card in any graveyard from the game, and Kagon deals 1 frost damage to target hero or ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.

name: Lord Anton Lightbane
setname: Wrath of the Lich King Promo
rules: Anton and Ghouls in your party are Protectors. 3 -> Remove target ally card in any graveyard from the game and put a Ghoul ally token into play with 1 [Melee] ATK / 1 health.
